tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Payment_Options (
  payment_option_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  payment_option_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  integration_method VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  third_party_service VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE payment_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES payment_users(user_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE payment_services (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    service_provider VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    service_fee DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    available BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)
